    Interface for implementing persistence.

      • getNextMissingRange

        MsgRange getNextMissingRange(Topic topic)
        Get the maximum seq ID range of the messages missing in cache, inclusive-exclusive [low, hi). Returns null if all messages are present or no messages are found.

      • setRead

        boolean setRead(Topic topic,
                int read)

            Subscription sub)

      • msgSend

        long msgSend(Topic topic,
             Drafty data,
             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> head)
        Save message to DB as "sending".
        Parameters:
        topic - topic which sent the message
        data - message data to save
        head - message headers
        Returns:
        database ID of the message suitable for use in msgDelivered(Topic topic, long id, Date timestamp, int seq)

      • msgDraft

        long msgDraft(Topic topic,
              Drafty data,
              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> head)
        Save message to database as a draft. Draft will not be sent to server until it status changes.
        Parameters:
        topic - topic which sent the message
        data - message data to save
        head - message headers
        Returns:
        database ID of the message suitable for use in msgDelivered(Topic topic, long id, Date timestamp, int seq)

      • msgDraftUpdate

        boolean msgDraftUpdate(Topic topic,
                       long dbMessageId,
                       Drafty data)
        Update message draft content without
        Parameters:
        topic - topic which sent the message
        dbMessageId - database ID of the message.
        data - updated content of the message. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise

      • msgReady

        boolean msgReady(Topic topic,
                 long dbMessageId,
                 Drafty data)
        Message is ready to be sent to the server.
        Parameters:
        topic - topic which sent the message
        dbMessageId - database ID of the message.
        data - updated content of the message. If null only status is updated.
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise

      • msgSyncing

        boolean msgSyncing(Topic topic,
                   long dbMessageId,
                   boolean sync)
        Message is being sent to the server.
        Parameters:
        topic - topic which sent the message
        dbMessageId - database ID of the message.
        sync - true when the sync started, false when it's finished unsuccessfully.
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise

      • msgFailed

        boolean msgFailed(Topic topic,
                  long dbMessageId)
        Failed to form or send message.
        Parameters:
        topic - topic which sent the message
        dbMessageId - database ID of the message.
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise

      • msgPruneFailed

        boolean msgPruneFailed(Topic topic)
        Delete all failed messages in the given topis.
        Parameters:
        topic - topic which sent the message
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise

      • msgDiscard

        boolean msgDiscard(Topic topic,
                   long dbMessageId)
        Delete message by database id.

      • msgDelivered

        boolean msgDelivered(Topic topic,
                     long dbMessageId,
                     java.util.Date timestamp,
                     int seq)
        Message delivered to the server and received a real seq ID.
        Parameters:
        topic - topic which sent the message.
        dbMessageId - database ID of the message.
        timestamp - server timestamp.
        seq - server-issued message seqId.
        Returns:
        true on success, false otherwise *

      • getQueuedMessageDeletes

        MsgRange[] getQueuedMessageDeletes(Topic topic,
                                   boolean hard)
        Get a list of pending delete message ranges.
        Parameters:
        topic - topic where the messages were deleted.
        hard - set to true to fetch hard-deleted messages, soft-deleted otherwise.
